title: Fundamental Nursing Education Course Based on Virtual Reality Simulation (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing concepts and medical terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Utilizing VR simulation tools in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment for nursing skills education applicable to real-life scenarios for general citizens

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic patient assessments and emergency response procedures with 80% accuracy via VR simulation.
Learners can revise nursing intervention plans at least twice by incorporating peer feedback in simulation-based debriefings.
Learners can apply three or more infection control protocols appropriately in smartphone-based VR environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
